column4: whiz2: pretty generic question,  how exactly are you copying files?  FTP, samba, other?
whiz2: can you mount(map on windows) the remote share, and get read only access, just not write?
i had better luck with virtualbox vs vmware, but thats just one experience
do you know how to make the bridge network  work?
already tried a script like that. It doesn't work
do you have to run the script on boot every time to make the configuration permanent?
that is exactly what I want. I don't need something like Wireshark for now.
can I get iptraf from main repositories?

I was looking in the application manager instead of Synaptic. Is already there thanks.  another application question. Do you know a good alternative for the default Remote Desktop Viewer that let me connect to a machine using XP and Ultr@VNC
I'm starting to love Ubuntu. The applet is already installed hehehehe
and now the iptraf is on my desktop working like a charm :-) thanks again
now I just have to fix my problem with Gufw. Any idea why it is locked or how to unlock it?
